ARIA substitution boxes for nonlinear transformation
Round constants for Korean cipher operations

primary_weakness: Korean algorithms are secure against classical attacks but vulnerable to Grover's algorithm (halved security)
additional_notes: ARIA and SEED are Korean government approved algorithms, considered secure but should transition to post-quantum alternatives
